global.comment-global: Environment variables that will be overridden for every target
global.comment-WINDOWS_AGENT_URL: Override download target (useful for testing specific build).  Must end in '/'
global.comment-WINDOWS_AGENT_FILE: Override download file (must _not_ end in msi)

hyperv.comment-hyperv-vars: Variables specific to the hyper-v driver
hyperv.SERVER_PASSWORD: <the password associated with the above user>

ec2.comment-ec2-vars: Variables specific to the hyper-v driver
ec2.comment_SSH_KEY: path to ssh key used to create instances
ec2.comment_SSH_ID: friendly name in EC2 associated with above ssh key
